article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Center of Northern Ohio Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Northern Ohio.
article.content:
​​

U.S. Export Assistance Center Locations

Cleveland USEAC

AkronUSEAC

600 Superior Avenue, E.
Suite. 700
Cleveland, OH 44114
(216) 522-4750		Kent State University
Administrative Services Bldg.
Kent, OH 44242
(330) 678-0695


U.S. Export Assistance Center Staff

USEAC Administrators and Trade Specialists

Michael Miller, Great Lakes Network Director
Phone: (216) 522-4750
Fax: (216) 522-2235
Email:Mike.Miller@trade.gov

Susan Whitney, USEAC Office Director, Sr. International Trade Specialist
Ohio Counties:Ashtabula, Cuyahoga, Geauga, Lake
Phone: (216) 522-4755
Fax: (216) 522-2235
Email:Susan.Whitney@trade.gov

Todd Hiser,Senior International Trade Specialist
Ohio Counties:Portage, Stark, Summit
Phone: (216) 522-4756 or (330) 678-0695
Fax: (216) 522-2235
Email:Todd.Hiser@trade.gov

Melissa Blackledge, International Trade Specialist
Ohio Counties:Cuyahoga, Defiance, Fulton, Henry, Lucas, Medina, Ottawa, Sandusky, Williams, Wood
Phone: (216) 522-4740
Fax: (216) 522-2235
Email:Melissa.Blackledge@trade.gov

Amy Freedman, International Trade Specialist (SCEP)

Ohio Counties:Carroll, Coshocton, Crawford, Hardin, Harrison, Holmes, Jefferson, Knox, Marion, Morrow, Seneca, Tuscarawas, Wyandot, Allen, Auglaize, Erie, Hancock, Huron, Lorain, Mahoning, Mercer, Paulding, Putnam, Trumbull, Van Wert.

Phone: (216) 522-4732

Fax: (216) 522-2235

Email:Amy.Freedman@trade.gov​

USEAC Support and Associates

Patrick Hayes, Regional Export Finance Manager
U.S. Small Business Administration
Phone: (216) 522-4750
Fax: (216) 522-2235
Email:Patrick.Hayes@trade.gov


Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Northern Ohio.
